• jenahajek.com

Hi! My name is Jéňa Hájek

and I am front-end architect from the beautiful Czech Republic (yet currently based in Nanning, China). I love participating on meaningful projects and that feeling when code grows under my typing hands. That's why I work with awesome Proof & Reason agency. When my keyboard is idle, I probably study, travel or exercise. If I have something valuable to say, I publish it here.

    Profesní

  • Frontend

    Nifty CSS tricks are usually really cool, but I personally am intrigued more by architecture – organizing, building and structuring the code. I don't want to make just good looking products. I want them to be well-built and prepared to withstand anything.

    • Osobní

  • Čtenářský deník

    Knihy, jakožto ideální prostředek pro sdílení znalostí, hodně a pozitivně ovlivňují můj život. Jak profesní, tak osobní. Chtěl bych proto krátce zmínit ty, které stojí za investovaní času i peněz.

∾
